about_the_game:
Story


There used to be a man called the strongest.
He defeated all the villains with one blow.
His descendants were naturally the strongest.
Then 2000 years passed.
His descendant had been given his own star by the Earth Federation Government...

About Game


A 3D third person shooter.
A game for a single player only.
It is a game in which the main character, “Strongest Legend, ” is manipulated to defeat the enemy and head for the destination of the dungeon.
Dungeons have multiple hierarchies.
The destination of each dungeon is displayed on a marker on the screen.
When the key in the dungeon is obtained, the door of the dungeon can be opened.
The destination of each dungeon can be reached to the next level.

Game Tips


The opening cutscene can be skipped with the ESC key.
The main character is operated by a mouse and a keyboard.
You can break the containers in the dungeon.
If you walk on the recovery item, your HP will recover.
The game is autosaved at the start of each level.
Hold the gun with the right mouse button and attack with the left mouse button.
If you have the ally member, she automatically follows you.
When the ally member finds an enemy, she starts attacking automatically.
Options can be changed from the main menu.


Potion. Recover HP.

Stamina potion. Recover stamina.

Controls


Move: W A S D
Strongest shock wave: E
Run: Shift key
Hold the weapon: Right click
Attack: Left click
Reload: R
Pause Screen: ESC key

content_descriptors.notes:
It includes an expression of attacking an enemy character with a gun.
There is an expression of bloodshed.

name: Earth is too small for me

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Earth is too small for me

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT, Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2600 MB available space

short_description: A simple TPS game. The strongest man is back. Manipulate "The Strongest Legend" and infiltrate the enemy dungeon. Of course, please don't forget to rescue the lady !
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
